def key(a):
    return a[1]
for i in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    n=int(raw_input())
    l={}
    for j in xrange(n):
        a,b=raw_input().split()
        b=int(b)
        if a not in l:
            l[a]=b
        else:
            l[a]+=b
    l=l.items()
    l.sort(key=key)
    print l[-1][0],l[-1][1]
